title: It's So Cozy Up Here
prose:
Life in the cloud is nice. You would know because you are a raindrop that has just formed. You are surrounded by new friends and you have grown so much over the last 5 minutes.
But the best things in life do not last. Before you know it, you have gotten too heavy to stay where you are. Time for some action.
endPrompt: Is it time to drop yet?
